overview: Brett Swanson has it all. He's got an adorable boyish face with big blue eyes that just draw you into them. He's developed a studly muscular body, ripped and chiseled in all the right places. And he's got the sexual energy of a wild animal, ready to devour his prey. Or rather, should I say he's usually the one being devoured, which explains why so many people love to see Brett Swanson On Bottom.
title: Brett Swanson on Bottom
